metadata.title: CVE-2022-3381 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from10.0 to 15.7.8, 15.8 prior to 15.8.4 and 15.9 prior to 15.9.2. A craftedURL could be used to redirect users to arbitrary sites

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
